request.description: setting of SRv6 enabled is not supported by VPP now

item.name: Write IPv6 FIB 1 (lookup table for END T functions)
Delete IPv6 FIB 1 (lookup table for END T functions)
Write IPv4 FIB 1 (lookup table for END T functions)
DeleteIPv4 FIB 1 (lookup table for END T functions)

request.description:
equivalent to vpp command:
-> vppctl set sr encaps source addr A::1

equivalent to vpp command:
-> vppctl sr localsid address B:: behavior end

equivalent to vpp command:
-> vppctl sr localsid address B:: behavior end

equivalent to vpp command:
-> vppctl sr localsid address B:: behavior end

equivalent to vpp command:
-> vppctl sr localsid address B:: behavior end

equivalent to vpp command:
-> vppctl sr localsid address A:: behavior end.x local0 A::1

Sid name in VPP (A::101) consists of two parts:
- First part is Locator e.g. "A::" (mapped to locator -> name)
- Second part is function e.g. "101" (mapped to sid -> opcode)

equivalent to vpp command:
-> vppctl sr localsid del address A::501 behavior end.t 1

PRECONDITION:
IPv6 Fib table must exist on VPP -> sudo vppctl ip6 table add 1
